definition: to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲
to separate oneself from/to break away from/diastasis (medicine)/abscission/abjunction (botany)
to be far from/to keep away from
to retire/to leave office/to quit a job

sentences.english: "Be clean!" And immediately the leprosy left him.
sentences.chinese: 大麻瘋立刻就離了他的身。

sentences.english: Rwanda is far from fully recovered.
sentences.chinese: 盧旺達離完全恢復還很遠。

sentences.english: In eccentric type of IV enlargement, the LVMI was increased.
sentences.chinese: 左室離心性擴張型的左室重量指數增加。

sentences.english: She is a pretty and coquettish woman.
sentences.chinese: 她是個妖冶女人，要離她遠些。

sentences.english: Is the office near public transport, either the subway or a bus station?
sentences.chinese: 新辦公室離公共交通工具，地鐵或者公共汽車站近嗎？

sentences.english: Riverside Hotel at Sea Island in the southern part of Davao, from the international airport two kilometers.
sentences.chinese: 海島水邊飯店位於達沃的南部，離國際機場2公里。

sentences.english: It' near Guzhen Park and about 300 meters away from my shop.
sentences.chinese: 門市接近古鎮公園，離我門市大年夜約300米距離。

sentences.english: They booked us into a tuppeny-ha'penny hotel near the docks.
sentences.chinese: 他們爲我們在離碼頭不遠處訂了個廉價旅館。

sentences.english: The doctor said my wife was too near her term to travel by air.
sentences.chinese: 醫生說我的妻子離分娩期很近，不宜乘飛機旅行。

sentences.english: Every pratfall loss brings them closer to history.
sentences.chinese: 每一次恥辱的失敗都讓他們離那個歷史記錄更近。

sentences.english: Very far away from the juvenile Teacher decades have not seen a few noodle.
sentences.chinese: 老師離少年很遠，幾十年也沒見過幾面。

sentences.english: Most Zainichi remove themselves from the North Korean regime as much as they can.
sentences.chinese: 大部分在日朝鮮人使自己離朝鮮政權越遠越好。

sentences.english: Sweep away all dharmas, and separate from all marks.

sentences.chinese: 波茲南，離哥本哈根還有多遠？

sentences.english: The picture was recorded from an Alpine mountain pass not far from Turin, Italy.
sentences.chinese: 這張照片是在離意大利都靈不遠的一條山道上拍攝的。

definition: far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
(in the) past/former/previous/to go over/to pass by
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish
